Uses of Class
org.apache.kudu.util.BloomFilter

  • Packages that use BloomFilter 
    Package Description
    org.apache.kudu.util  

    • Uses of BloomFilter in org.apache.kudu.util

      Methods in org.apache.kudu.util that return BloomFilter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.byCount(int expectedCount)
      Generate bloom filter, default hashing is Murmur2 and false positive rate is 0.01.
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.byCountAndFPRate(int expectedCount, double fpRate)
      Generate bloom filter, default hashing is Murmur2.
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.byCountAndFPRate(int expectedCount, double fpRate, org.apache.kudu.util.BloomFilter.HashFunction hashFunction)
      Generate bloom filter.
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.bySize(int nBytes)
      Generate bloom filter, default hashing is Murmur2 and false positive rate is 0.01.
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.bySizeAndFPRate(int nBytes, double fpRate)
      Generate bloom filter, default hashing is Murmur2.
      static BloomFilter BloomFilter.bySizeAndFPRate(int nBytes, double fpRate, org.apache.kudu.util.BloomFilter.HashFunction hashFunction)
      Generate bloom filter.
